MS MCQs

    Manage internal warehouse processes in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. Other than inventory movements, what other function can you use in Business Central to move items between bins for locations that are set up with bin mandatory?

      Item reclassification journals

      Movement worksheets

      Movement journals

      Warehouse journals


    2. You will be posting a negative adjustment for an item in a warehouse that is set up with mandatory bin usage. How can you quickly check that this bin contains the quantity to be adjusted?

      By opening the Bin Contents page from the item journal

      By opening the warehouse entries and filtering them with the bin code to which you want to post the negative adjustment

      By opening the item ledger entries and filtering them with the bin code to which you want to post the negative adjustment

      By opening the bin ledger entries and filtering them with the bin code to which you want to post the negative adjustment
